name: Donut Shoot
description:
DONUT SHOOT  by Caitlyn Milne

Some browsers may work better then others, avoid playing on Edge

Instructions

Feed the hungry customers above, but careful, colours are being banned left right and center, its probably those e numbers.

Drag and drop the donuts onto the customers to earn cash. Dragging a banned donut will end the game. Throw away bad donuts down the trash shoot.

Trijam

This was made for trijam 214 where I had 3 hours to make a game, not including compile time, uploading, and comming up with the idea.

The jams theme was "Don't shoot", this game fits the theme because there is no shooting, and there is a Donut Shoot .

Art and Code was made by me.

Audio was from free to use sources online, as well as my humble bundle audio collecitons.
